code: export const shuffle=arr=>[...arr].sort(()=>0.5-Math.random());export const buildUrl=(url,params)=>{let urlWithParams=url;Object.entries(params).forEach((_ref,i)=>{let[key,value]=_ref;const sign=!i?"?":"&";urlWithParams+="".concat(sign).concat(key,"=").concat(value);});return urlWithParams;};export const sumBy=arr=>arr.reduce((prev,cur)=>prev+cur,0);
